title: Cats
short_description: Print of a cat with string and red dots in a trompe l'oeil frame
long_description: Trompe l'oeil picture frame with a kitten in the inside right hand of the frame.  The kitten is surrounded by lines representing string and red dots at the bottom, mimicking the dots used to denote a sold print at the Royal Academy Summer Exhibition.  The frame is ornate with detailing at each corner and the red of the dots is a deep red.

title: Self Portrait
short_description: Self portrait of the artist's face as seen through, or reflected in, a window pane in the foreground
long_description: The foreground of the work features a rain spotted window through which the artist's face is seen blurrily. The foregrounded window with a very prominent lock in the bottom third of the work indicates we are inside a room, rather than outside, and that we are either seeing a reflection in the room rather than looking through the window, or that the artist is outside the window looking in on the viewer.
themes: Windows, Refraction, Occlusion, Faces, The Artist Himself, Raindrops
notes: Labelled AP.  Where work is signed, leave 3cm additionally in height when framing.

title: Cage
short_description: A crowd encased by a wired fence in the foreground
long_description: The foreground of the print consists of a photographic imprint of a wire fence, behind which a vast crowd of smudgy faces retreats into the distance.  The faces at the front of the work closest to the fence have an ethereal quality.
notes: The reverse of the print has a exhibition label.  Exhibition National Print 1997 At THE MALL GALLERIES (The Federation of British Artists).  Title of work - Cage.  Mr Bill Good.  Address 17 St Marks Cres London NW1.  Medium - Etching.  Price in Pounds Â£100.  There is a separate label marking 033.

title: Fishes
short_description: Photos of fish overlaid with multiple municipal notices, including 'Caution' and 'No Diving', all in a green hue
long_description: There are several overlaid images of public signs, including several 'Caution', 'No diving' and iconic red circle/crossed line images indicating forbidden activitiy.  The etching is completed in a deepening shade of green, which progressively darkens from the top of the work to the bottom.  At the top of the print, several photographic fish swim through the notices.
notes: There is also a black print of the work

title: Island 501
short_description: A trompe l'oeil print of jeans which appears as an island with a reflective surrounding water and clouds
long_description: A pair of jeans are constructed to appear as an island, wtith reflective water in the foreground and clouds above.  One print is completed entirely in blue, with the seams and belt loops of the garment visible as geography on the 'island'.
themes: Popular Culture, Humour, Nature, Landscape, Everyday Objects, Surrealism

title: A Barn in Vidaillat
short_description: An image of the interior of a barn, with green bottles hanging in background
long_description: Interior of a barn with the various textures of wood and features of architecture included.  The work is in black and white except for a feature of stashed green bottles, in a deep jewel green in the upper right half of the etching.

title: Look Right
short_description: A cut off road marking reads 'OK RIGH' askew in the foreground, while an arrangement of glowing lights queue in a rain-spackled background
long_description: A black and white etching prominently featuring a cut-off road marking, fully suggesting 'LOOK RIGHT', clipped by the bottom and right sides of the image, while a queue of glowing lights recede into the top left background.  The image appears to be seen through a rain-spattered screen or other viewing panel.
themes: Signage, Urban Life, Refraction, Texture, Reflection, Raindrops

title: Billy
short_description: Self portrait of the artist in black and white with one eye outlined in red
long_description: Close up of the artist's face, with outlined sections. The etching is completed in black with the left eye outlined in red. The artist's face is in stark relief against a very dark background.
themes: Chiaroscuro, Faces, The Artist Himself, Death
version_a: Black. One eye is outlined red after printing

title: Reclining Figure
short_description: Reclining figure covered by checked cloth with leaves in the background
long_description: The hazy silhouette of a figure reclines, shrouded by a checked pattern, and surrounded by suggested leaves and other vegetation.
themes: Optical Art, Contours, Nature, The Body, Enshroudment, Material, Surrealism
notes: One alternate print features figure only

title: Anthony On One Elbow
short_description: A reclining photorealistic child is seen through what appears to be a rain-soaked window
long_description: The foreground of the work is overcome by rain droplets which cover an apparent window. Through the window we see the reclining figure of an older child, most prominently his face and hand, with his body propped on one elbow. The figure occupies the central space of the etching, which is completed in black and white.

title: The Diver
short_description: A sign denoting 'No Diving' is pictured diving into a swimming pool of public notice signs
long_description: The top third of the painting is blank save for a debossed impression of a 'No diving' circular sign, in the centre of which is a diving figure, pointing into a green supposed swimming pool. The pool is composed of several overlaid signs, indicating  'No Diving', 'Slow Lane' and similar public swimming pool notices. These signs are overprinted with the blue outlines of pool swimming lanes and water ripples.
notes: The 'no' sign is either debossed or embossed on different prints.

title: Family Portrait
short_description: A portait composed the quarters of four faces. The source images of the faces are offered in small beneath the composite image
long_description: Four faces of one family are each divided to represent one quadrant of a joint 'family face'.  The work is completed in black, with a photo strip of all the original faces from which the joint portrait is constructred, beneath the main face. Clockwise from top-left, the faces are: mother, youngest son, father, eldest son.

title: The Finish
short_description: Eight racers run from right to left across a blank background, the figures growing in size and detail from top to bottom
long_description: Eight hurdlers run from right to left across a blank background. The foremost hurdler, at the bottom of the image, is photgraphically detailed; the racers recede in both size and detail further up the image, finally reduced to abstract shapes.

title: The Stones
short_description: A portrait of Keith Richards and Mick Jagger, their faces composed of many large round dots
long_description: The closely cropped faces of Richards and Jagger emerge from a constellation of large multi-coloured dots. Each dot is about the size of a 2 pence piece. Printed with 3 different colours, the dots overlap each other to create a dense texture.

title: Reclining Nude III
short_description: A figure reclines in bed, a covering quilt is suggested by a contoured checked pattern, but could also be a net.
long_description: The image is broadly separated into dark and light by the reclining figure, whose blurry outline is in contrast with the sharp checked pattern of the quilt or net which covers her.

title: No Games
short_description: Two figures are posed underneath a streetlight at night, with a sign on the right reading 'NO BALL GAMES, ETC'.
long_description: Two small figures are lit starkly from the streetlight above them. The texture of brick and paving predominates, with a small but prominent sign on the extreme right of the piece which reads, 'NO BALL GAMES, ETC'. Through a slim avenue we can see the suggestion of low rise buildings.
themes: Urban Life, Signage, Fear, Chiaroscuro, Fear, Texture
version_b: Alternative version features an orange background airbrushed after printing.

title: Lido
short_description: A near-solid block of blue which is comprised of a multitude of signs, and a single white splash to suggest its liquidity.
long_description: Myriad signs pertaining to swimming pool regulations make up a nearly solid block of blue. Towards the right is a single white splash, to suggest we are looking down upon the surface of a body of water. An alternative print is fringed on two sides by a deeper blue, with a dark protuding rectangle which, in combination, give the suggestion of the shadow of the pool's walls and diving board.
version_b: Alternative version features the shadow of a diving board and sides of the swimming pool, airbrushed after printing.

title: To Dive Underneath the Water
short_description: A large diver is frozen mid-dive above a blue swimming pool suggested by many interweaving signs.
long_description: A large halftone diver, not yet uncoiled from his dive, is caught the moment before he breaks the surface of the water below, which itself is suggested by many interweaving signs, many which prominently read 'NO DIVING'. The top two thirds of the image are in yellow and black, and just above the surface of the pool there is text which describes how to perform a dive.
themes: Sport, Swimming, Signage, The Body, Text
notes:
The quoted text reads:
To dive underneath the water

He must, if he be in a place where he may stand upon the ground, with as much force as he can, leap up, and bending his head to-wards his breast fall forwards down into the water, as thus: (II. 34)
version_a: Blue water beneath yellow background, with brown figure.

title: Goal
short_description: Through the netting of a goalmouth we see the blurry figures of footballers at the moment after a goal has been scored.
long_description: The sharp netting of the goal contrasts with the blurry footballers just beyond it. Though there is little suggestion of where the ball may be, the celebratory pose of the figure on the right suggests he has just scored. On the left, the image is vertically bisected by a goalpost.

title: Reclining Squares II
short_description: A reclining nude is draped in a checked cloth, her body visible beneath it. The background is filled by the same checked pattern.
long_description: A ghostly nude reclines under what appears to be a translucent checked cloth. Behind her the checked pattern of the cloth rises to fill the composition. The face and other features of the figure are scarcely suggested, though at the bottom of the image her hands are rendered clearly enough to see the rings on her fingers.
themes: Optical Art, The Body, Enshroudment, Surrealism, Contours, Nude, Material
version_a: Red figure, Blue squares, Yellow background
version_c: Red, Blue and Yellow: red figure with blue and yellow background -- the blue and yellow inks mix into a deep green

title: Gargoyle
short_description: The artist is seen from above with a stricken expression.
long_description: The artist's face, seen slightly from above, emerges from a deep, textured green mottled with blue. His expression is one of overt fear, eyes fixed upwards, hand gripping his mouth, lit dramatically from the side.
themes: Faces, The Artist Himself, Fear, Texture, Humour

title: Johnny
short_description: An abstract image of different bands of darkness, a pair of eyes and a forehead visible in two of them.
long_description: A pair of eyes, and what appears to be the man's forehead, are dramatically cropped into bands of darkness. Apart from these bands of detail, the image is almost entirely white, except for a wavering line in the middle which again yields to some dark detail beyond.

title: Reclining Squares
short_description: A nude lying on her side is overlaid by a checked pattern whose contours interact with those of the woman.
long_description: The nude is depicted mostly by the shadows she casts, lying on her side as if asleep, with her head resting on her arm. Overlaying the whole image is a high contrast checkered pattern, which seems to envelope the figure, and describe her form in its own contours.
themes: Optical Art, Enshroudment, Contours, The Body, Nude
version_b: Black and silver. Black figure on silver background.
version_c: Blue, red and yellow. Figure printed blue on a red and yellow background. Inks mix to render the figure green.
version_d: Red and Green. Pinkish red figure on green background.

title: England 20 Australia 17
short_description: A rugby player scoring a try slides above a white stripe of grass.
long_description: The figure of the prone rugby player spans the whole width of the image, appearing to float just above a white stripe of grass. The grass is large enough to see each blade, suggesting it is in the extreme foreground.
notes: The artist's right eye is outlined in red by hand after the print.

title: Mirror, Mirror
short_description: A spectral woman adjusts her hair in front of a distant mirror.
long_description: A hazy, ghostly woman is seen from behind, adjusting her hair in front of some mirrors. The image is dark, and the mirrors are at some distance from her. We see the suggestion of a shirt clothing her nearest form, but her reflections appear to be nude. To her right is a ballustrade lit from beneath, suggesting the scene is dimly illuminated by a room below.
themes: Chiaroscuro, The Body, Reflection, Picture In Picture, Material

title: Flagstones
short_description: Eleven separate plates are composed to suggest brickwork, half covered by a Union Jack flag.
long_description: The apparent brickwork is printed with eleven separate small plates. Half of the image is in the pattern of a Union Jack flag, though the mortar lines are uninterrupted.
notes: Marked AP. The print consists of 11 separate plates arranged ilike brickwork.

title: Reclining Nude II
short_description: A figure reclines in bed, covered by a quilt suggested by a checked pattern.
long_description: A hazy figure reclines in bed, her quilt described only by its checked pattern, the figure visible through it. In the background we can see the details of her bedroom.

title: The Lady of the House Revisited
No Cycling
notes: Marked AP. The 'no cycling' sign is penned red by hand.

title: Self Portrait II
themes: The Artist Himself, Material, Contours, Faces

title: An Aborigine On Primrose Hill
themes: Primrose Hill, Nature, Humour, Surrealism, Negation
version_b: A red 'no' symbol is coloured after printing

title: Anthony in His Room
themes: Windows, Family, Occlusion, Raindrops, Refraction, Faces

title: Bicycle
themes: Optical Art, Enshroudment, Contours, Everyday Objects

title: Boomerang
themes: Primrose Hill, Nature, Humour, Surrealism, Negation
notes: Alternate print features a 'no' sign formed by negative space around the hilltop figure

title: Looking Through Grass
notes: Two versions have different grass in their foregrounds
